definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: Designing a floating point calculator using FPGA technology may shorten the development cycle of product.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了基於FPGA技術的浮點運算器的設計與實現。

sentences.english: Floating point arithmetic is rarely exact.
sentences.chinese: 浮點運算很少是精確的。

sentences.english: MIXED fixed effects sensitive to magnitude of dependent variable, floating point problems.
sentences.chinese: 混合固定效應敏感依靠規模變量，浮點運算的問題。

sentences.english: The floating point arithmetic is very important for high performance arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 浮點運算是高性能計算研究中的一個重要領域。
